synopsis.text:
Anime Synopsis:

The world witnesses an unprecedented event as a new continent, Magmell, mysteriously emerges from the depths of the ocean. Brimming with unexplored territories, unique flora, fauna, and valuable resources, the continent sparks a renewed era of exploration and discovery. However, this uncharted land is not without its perils.

To navigate the dangers of Magmell, a specialized group of individuals known as 'anglers' come to the fore. Among them is Inyou, a seasoned and skilled angler, who, along with his assistant Zero, undertakes search, rescue, and relief missions for those brave enough to venture into Magmell's wild frontier. As explorers and researchers face a series of calamities, Inyou and his colleagues provide crucial support, turning their own lives into a constant stream of thrilling adventures.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
